Arnold n 1: English poet and literary critic (1822-1888) [syn: {Matthew Arnold}] 2: United States general and traitor in the American Revolution; in 1780 his plan to surrender West Point to the British was foiled (1741-1801) [syn: {Benedict Arnold}]
